Question: ['What precautions should be taken while handling the product?']
Answer: ['Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Keep container tightly closed. Keep cool. Ground and bond container and receiving equipment. Use explosion-proof equipment. Wear protective glove/protective clothing/eye protection /face protection. Use non-sparking tools.']

Question: ['What are the first aid measures in case of inhalation?']
Answer: ['Rinse skin with water [or shower]. Take off immediately all contaminated clothing. IF IN EYES. Rinse cautiously with water for several minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present and easy to do. Continue rinsing; There are no first aid measures in case of inhalation']
Source: ['Section 3: Composition/Information on Ingredients, Section 6: Accidental Release Measures']

Question: ['What precautions should be taken for safe handling and storage of the product?']
Answer: ['Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Keep container tightly closed. Keep cool. Ground and bond container and receiving equipment.
